job.title: Implementation Manager, Mid-Market, General Contractors
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Procore is expanding our Customer Success team We are hiring ltstronggtImplementation Managersltstronggt to partner with clients to manage training drive adoption and build longlasting partnerships This role is a balance of independent work where youll own and develop multiple new accounts at a time while also partnering with Account Executives Product and other Customer Success team members to help your clients join and grow with Procore This is not a sales positionltbrgtltbrgtOur Implementation Managers will be given the opportunity to plan rollout strategies then execute the implementation and onboarding of new accounts while also contributing to a growing team and officeltbrgtltbrgtSome travel is required 510 to visit client sites attend industry events travel to other Procore offices and moreltbrgtltbrgtThis position can be remote and were looking for someone to join our team immediatelyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Were Looking ForltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtTech industry sophomores looking for a new challengeltbrgtltulgtltligt Previously managed implementation of SaaS software platforms including onboarding training and new client relationships ltligtltligt Understanding of complex web and mobile applications utilized for documentation management project management or similar ltbrgtltligtltulgtConstruction pros looking to transition into a fast paced software companyltbrgtltulgtltligt Experience in a project administration or management role within the construction industry including Project Engineer Project Manager Assistant Project Manager and Project Administrator ltligtltligt Procore platform users highly preferred not required ltligtltligt Must be technology evangelists and promoters of modernizing the Construction industry ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Doltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Taking new clients and transforming them into Procore experts and evangelists through training in person and remote via screen sharing software support and relationship management ltligtltligt Providing the highest level of service and support to Procores clients through diligent communication ltligtltligt Communicating with fellow team members mentoring and asking questions via instant messaging email phone and face to face meetings ltligtltligt Collaborating with all levels of the Procore organization to develop best practices connect clients with Product Managers and Marketing to further client success and Procores evolution as a market leader ltligtltligt Complete immersion and mastery of Procores product offerings business model services emerging technologies and Customer Success best practices ltbrgtltligtltulgtWhile our Customer Success team works closely with all levels of our organization including our sales team this position does not include any direct sellingrelated tasks or activities Our Customer Success team is solely focused on ensuring Procores clients are well supported educated and fully adopted on our platformltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtProcore Technologies is building the software that builds the world We provide cloudbased construction management software that helps clients more efficiently build skyscrapers hospitals housing complexes and more Our headquarters is located on the bluffs above the Pacific Ocean in Carpinteria CA with growing offices worldwide Check us out on Glassdoor to see what others are saying about working at ProcoreltbrgtltbrgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and welcome builders of all backgrounds We thrive in a diverse dynamic and inclusive environment We do not tolerate discrimination against employees on the basis of age color disability gender gender identity or expression marital status national origin political affiliation race religion sexual orientation veteran status or any other classification protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPerks ampamp BenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou are a person with dreams goals and ambitionsboth personally and professionally Thats why we believe in providing benefits that not only match our Procore values Openness Optimism and Ownership but enhance the lives of our team members Here are just a few of our benefit offerings competitive health care plans flexible paid time off Procore Values Time employee enrichment and development programs and volunteer days
